title: Bug 18268: Unable to locate images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description: Bug 18268: The application is unable to find images and files in NL-specific subdirectories in build 200205291235. Setup: 1. Start Eclipse. 2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> 3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> Change the value of the aboutImage property to: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif 4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> Change the value of the aboutImage property to: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif 7. Open the about dialog. Observe: There is a main image again. This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the "$nl$" path segment is not being handled correctly.
OB: Opening the about dialog, the main image is not displayed.
EB: The main image should be displayed correctly in the about dialog.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Exit Eclipse. 2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif> 3. Start Eclipse. 4. Start Eclipse again.
